name: Spookfestation
description:
Spookfestation

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys -> Movement

LMB / Click -> Shoot

Description

A short game by https://brinjaw.itch.io/ and https://daggerkn19ht.itch.io/ for Mini Jam 117: Ghosts hosted by ZahranW 

Theme: Ghosts, Limitation: Shotgun as a mechanic

Duration: 14/10/2022 - 17/10/2022

Thank you for playing and any feedback is appreciated~
